title: (x) drag queens fashion week - House Chalet {Joseph W, Franz}
content:
hello all ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20111122043916im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
i'm looking for the fonts that are circled. sorry for the bad quality of the picture, i had to use my phone camera to take the picture and it's off of a magazine.   
   
any help would be greatly appreciated ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20111122043916im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
 ![where can i find these?](http://web.archive.org/web/20111122043916im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/37821.jpg)   
   
thanks & regards,   
aaron.
author: aeron

comments.content:
drag queens looks like House Industries Chalet-London Nineteen Seventy   
   
  [http://www.houseindustries.com/house.php?kit=CHALET-FO&sub=view](http://web.archive.org/web/20111122043916/http:/www.houseindustries.com/house.php?kit=CHALET-FO&sub=view)   
   
Joseph ;-)

AMP FIDDLER & drag queens: [Chalet](http://web.archive.org/web/20111122043916/http:/www.houseindustries.com/house.php?kit=CHALET-FO&sub=view) London 1970   
   
fashionweek: The f would be interesting.. Probably Chalet too, Paris 1980   
   
...Noo, Joseph wins! ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20111122043916im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)

thanks guys! that was lightning fast! ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20111122043916im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
edit: franz, you were correct ;) 'fashionweek' is definitely paris 1980... i guess i'll be needing to aquire chalet very very soon ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20111122043916im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
